name: Pigeon's Revenge
description:
Story:

After a long time living in peace a note arrives on your desk. It is a desperate plea for help, and you know exactly what that means.

You spent many years of your life working for the Elite Pigeon Task Force, but since then you've been retired 6 months. If they needed you back, something bad must have happened.

Your job, to eliminate Wally. He thought it reasonable to hunt and eat a pigeon, a pigeon you used to work with no less. Now it was your time to take revenge.

Features:
  • Fly through town
  • Drop 'bombs' on civilians
  • Mute the noises (trust me)
  • Try out Turbo Mode
